Title: Education
Description: Education, including schools, universities and other learning and training facilities

Title: Health
Description: Health, including hospitals, healthcare and human services

Title: Energy
Description: Energy, including electric power generation, and the transmission and distribution of electricity, oil and gas, for example: power plants, power lines, gas pipelines

Title: Communications
Description: Communications, including ICT, IT, telecommunications, postal facilities, high-speed internet, broadband

Title: Water and waste
Description: Water and waste, including sanitation and wastewater

Title: Governance
Description: Governance, including government accommodations, public buildings, government offices; justice, courts; emergency services / response, local security; security, prisons, corrections; defense, military

Title: Economy
Description: Economy, including agribusiness, agriculture, science and environment

Title: Culture, sports and recreation
Description: Culture, sports and recreation, including tourism, parks and green areas

Title: Transport
Description: Transport. A more detailed breakdown may be provided using the transport.[mode] codes

Title: Air transport
Description: Air transport, including airports, airways and aviation

Title: Water transport
Description: Water transport, including ports and inland waterways

Title: Road transport
Description: Road transport, including roads, highways, streets, tunnels and bridges

Title: Urban transport
Description: Urban transport, including mass transit, urban mobility, buses, cycling, walking and taxi
